# Load the data
```{r}
# load data.csv file
row_data <- read.csv("courbe-de-charge-de-la-production-delectricite-par-filiere.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ";")
attach(row_data)
```

# Data summary
```{r}
# print the data summary
summary(row_data)
```


# Data visualization
```{r}
# convert date_heure column to date format
mydatetime = as.POSIXct('2016-01-01T00:00:00+01:00', tz = 'PST8PDT')
print(mydatetime)

date_format = "%Y-%m-%d'T'%h:%m:%s%Z"
data$date_heure <- as.Date(row_data$date_heure, format = date_format)
print(data$date_heure)

# visualize dates distribution
#hist(row_data$date_heure, breaks = 100, main = "Distribution des dates", xlab = "Date")

```


# Data visualization
```{r}
# load ggplot2 package
library(ggplot2)

# plot the data
ggplot(data, aes(x = date_heure, y = production_totale_mw, color = Filière)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + labs(title = "Production d'électricité par filière", x = "Année", y = "Production (GWh)")

```
